A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's as bad as the real critics (not those bought off by Disney) say it is.  I sat through 2.5 hours of total crap with only about 20 minutes of scenes that had the right to call themselves Star Wars.

I couldn't get into most of the scenes and really didn't like any of the new people introduced in this episode.  I felt like this was a Marvel movie with bad acting and unfunny humor that just would have elements of Star Wars sprinkled in.

It was really\, REALLY bad.
